item.title: 🏗️ How this blog was set up
item.description: Aren’t we here to talk about technology? My needs I’m looking for a solution with no maintenance that helps me to focus on writing content and not maintaining the full system. So don’t expect a microservice architectured CMS on AWS Lambda though we might use it for some projects later :) I also want a system with multilingual support to write in Globish 🇬🇧🇺🇸 and French 🇫🇷. This fits completely the architecture type called Jamstack that sits on top of pre-rendering and decoupling.
